title: USAT Liberty Shipwreck Tulamben (Half-day)
overview: Dive or snorkel at the famous USAT Liberty Shipwreck in Tulamben, a world-class underwater site.

stops.description: Arrive and prepare for diving or snorkeling.
Explore the shipwreck and marine life.
Relax on the beach or explore nearby coral reefs.

title: USAT Liberty Shipwreck Tulamben Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of diving, snorkeling, and marine exploration at the USAT Liberty Shipwreck in Tulamben.

stops.description: Arrive and prepare for multiple dives or snorkeling sessions.
Explore the shipwreck and surrounding coral reefs.
Lunch at a local dive resort (optional).
Continue diving or snorkeling, or relax on the beach.
